name: Poppy Playtime Triple Pack
summary: ﻿THREE GAMES IN 1 PACK! Embark on an epic journey filled with mystery, puzzles, eerie environments and the most terrifying toy characters to ever come to life. Over a decade ago, all the employees of Playtime Co. mysteriously vanished, except for you. You must return and discover what really happened at the now abandoned factory of the most popular toy company in history. But beware the toys are now alive, and they may not be as friendly as they seem. Take your first steps into Playtime Co. with the first 3 chapters in the Poppy Playtime saga! Chapter 1: A Tight Squeeze - Try to survive the vengeful toys waiting for you in the abandoned toy factory. Use your GrabPack to hack electrical circuits or nab anything from afar. Explore the mysterious facility...and don't get caught. Chapter 2: Fly in a Web - Descend deeper into the toy factory where mind-numbing puzzles and horrific toys await. Grapple and swing your way to safety. Try to escape - and don't let Mommy find you. Chapter 3: Deep Sleep - A decrepit orphanage known as Playcare sits beneath the once magical toy factory. You must make your way through this frightening place, solving new puzzles and avoiding the nightmares that lurk within the dark. Answers lie between the puzzles, characters and clues you encounter...If you can survive.
